column2:
Hello,

I would like to invite you to join the {{subprogram_or_program_name}} {{as_role_name_articleized}}.

Click here to accept the invitation and sign up for {{subprogram_or_program_name}}. Once you do that, you can fill out your profile and participate in the program activities.

I look forward to your participation! If you have any questions, please contact me here.

column1: You have a pending invitation to join {{subprogram_or_program_name}}
column2:
Hello,

A couple of weeks ago I invited you to participate in {{subprogram_or_program_name}} {{as_role_name_articleized}}. As of today, I have not heard back from you.

This is a reminder that your invitation will expire in about 15 days.

Click here to accept the invitation and sign up for {{subprogram_or_program_name}}. Once you do that, you can fill out your profile and participate in the program activities.

I look forward to your participation! If you have any questions, please contact me here.

Hello,

About a month ago, I invited you to participate in {{subprogram_or_program_name}} {{as_role_name_articleized}}. As of today, I still have not heard back from you.

Your invitation will expire on {{invitation_expiry_date}}. This will be the last reminder you will receive.

Click here to accept the invitation and sign up for {{subprogram_or_program_name}}.

I look forward to your participation! If you have any questions, please contact me here.
